text.0: shorten our ways o pūṣan move aside obstruction in the path.
text.1: go close before us cloudborn god.
text.2: drive pūṣan from our road the wolf the wicked inauspicious wolf.
text.3: who lies in wait to injure us.
text.4: who lurks about the path we take the robber with a guileful heart.
text.5: far from the road chase him away.
text.6: tread with thy foot and trample out the firebrand of the wicked one.
text.8: wise pūṣan wonderworker we claim of thee now the aid wherewith.
text.9: thou furtheredst our sires of old.
text.10: so lord of all prosperity best wielder of the golden sword.
text.11: make riches easy to be won.
text.12: past all pursuers lead us make pleasant our path and fair to tread.
text.13: o pūṣan find thou power for this.
text.14: lead us to meadows rich in grass send on our way no early heat.
text.15: o pūṣan find thou power for this.
text.16: be gracious to us fill us full give feed us and invigorate.
text.17: o pūṣan find thou power for this.
text.18: no blame have we for pūṣan him we magnify with songs of praise.
text.19: we seek the mighty one for wealth.
